properties.Name: DimEmissionFactor
properties.Description: The emissions factor linked to a specific emission

Columns.Name: EmissionFactorId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a fuel type.

Columns.Name: EmissionFactorName
Columns.Description: The name of a fuel type.

Columns.Name: Country
Columns.Description: The name of the country where the emission factor is valid

Columns.Name: EgridRegion
Columns.Description: The name of the eGrid region for emissions

Columns.Name: PeriodStartEmission
Columns.Description: The start period of an emission factor

Columns.Name: PeriodEndEmission
Columns.Description: The end period of an emission

Columns.Name: EmissionScope
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an emission scope

Columns.Name: EmissionFactorUom
Columns.Description: The uom of the market and location based factor

Columns.Name: Banner
Columns.Description: The banner related to the emission factor
